title: Help me I cant reconnect to my game.
body:
**Instead of putting me in loading screen for the game it simply went back to the client and i get stuck with the reconect button. So im losing games because of you riot......... I DEMAND COMPENSATION FOR MY LONG TIME COMMITMENT TO THIS GAME THAT FUCKS ME SO OFTEN. 
Thanks Love
Raaves**

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I can't provide any compensation for this issue, but I *can* help you troubleshoot this so we can find a solution for your issue connecting to games. I most often see this issue pop up if there's something going wrong between the client and our servers. Incompatible network configurations are commonly the culprit, so working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to setup your network for League is the best course of action to take from here.

Please let me know if those steps ended up resolving this issue.
